short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TurisVPN is a simple, easy-to-use VPN app, equipped with features you’d expect from a premium VPN provider.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
• Cost-effective:
At a monthly plan of only $3.99/month, get a bang for your buck with our competitive pricings, without compromising on features. We also have a free version for you to try out first, before deciding to commit!

• Cutting-Edge Technologies:
With the latest advanced WireGuard Protocols and IP-2HOP (Premium version only), your data is doubly masked and secured, highly encrypted, preventing DNS leaks.  Experience high-speed performances and streamlined design for ultra-security and a seamless browsing.

• Maintain ownership of your data:
Your personal activities are yours, so you can browse freely with a peace of mind. With our strict no-logs policy, we design our systems and processes to be unable to track nor expose your data, ensuring it stays private and confidential to you and your account. Upon providing you the service, our proprietary in-house system deletes the encrypted data, server wide. We are a VPN service provider, not an advertising data broker, we pledge to not sell your data to any third parties as a business. Please refer to our Privacy Policy for more details.

• HUMAN Customer Service:
Get help within moments, not weeks. Our customer service agents are committed to serving you through live chat support or email for the best experience. 

• One account, multiple devices:
With just a single Premium subscription, you can use TurisVPN on up to 4 of your devices. Free users will be able link up to 2 devices! TurisVPN is compatible across various platforms including iOS, Android and as a Chrome Extension, enabling you to protect your different devices.

• Ever-expanding network:
We are actively expanding our server networks, so that you can be spoilt for choice when deciding where to geo-hop and gain access to global content.

• Unlimited daily data usage:
Premium users experience unlimited data with no bandwidth or speed restrictions! Free users can enjoy up to 1GB of data daily.

• Remain safe on public WiFi
TurisVPN can help protect your personal information on public Wi-Fi networks by encrypting your internet traffic and providing a secure connection. This ensures that your data remains private and secure, even on potentially unsafe public networks.
